channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in the road at Fairfield Avenue junction, 2nd January
item.description:
Junction of Leckhampton Road and Fairfield Avenue Large square area where many potholes have been poorly repaired, now a larger one is a serious risk of injury to cyclists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 2nd January
item.description:
Between 6 and 4 Fairfield Avenue Photos show 8:00 pm and 7:30 am

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Fairfield Avenue, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drains, 2nd January
item.description:
There are 3 blocked drains along Pittville Lawn. They are outside no. 4, 6, and 17 They are blocked solid and are a risk for flooding. Please can you address. I took the photos 24.12.24 Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Pittville Lawn, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household bin bags in gate way, 2nd January
item.description:
This was fly tipped on 1/1/25
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Large quantity of glass on cycle path, 3rd January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.title: Pothole 12x18 inches and 2.5 inches deep at present, 2nd January
item.description:
Pothole in road near to kerb outside 29 Collum End Rise. Developing over the last fortnight and becoming larger and deeper every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Collum End Rise, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
